mapper.select: SELECT res_key as ctg_key FROM T_LINK_KEY WHERE REQ_TYPE = 100 AND RES_TYPE = 100 AND REQ_KEY = #{menuCtgKey}

SELECT A.REQ_KEY, C.TEACHER_KEY, D.NAME as teacherName FROM T_LINK_KEY A INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY B ON A.REQ_KEY = B.CTG_KEY INNER JOIN T_TEACHER C ON A.RES_KEY = C.TEACHER_KEY INNER JOIN T_USER D ON C.USER_KEY = D.USER_KEY WHERE A.REQ_TYPE = 100 AND A.RES_TYPE = 200 AND A.REQ_KEY = #{ctgKey} ORDER BY C.TEACHER_KEY ASC
